I was neither an unofficial nor an official member of the MfS, end of the announcement.
One last time: refrain from making these false claims. I will not ignore this slander.

No, not you, but the person who slanders me as IM. Please refrain from this insinuation and slander!

No. The Office for the Protection of the Constitution has protected Nazis in the past, even if it knew about planning or carrying out the most serious crimes, that must stop. This information must go to the police.

To everyone, including the federal police. #Right terrorism is a common problem. Incidentally, my request also applies to the state offices for #constitutional protection. #Hesse should start.

Horst #Seehofer didn't understand anything: The #constitutional protection should not be upgraded, but dissolved as a news service. All knowledge and files on #Right Terrorism available there must be handed over to the police and the GBA immediately.
